docs.snippet: F. Luis Mora, painter, illustratar and etcher, whose work hangs in the White House and in many public buildings and art museums throughout the country, died yesterday at his home, 160 East Seventy-second Street, after a short illness. He was 65 years...
docs.lead_paragraph: F. Luis Mora, painter, illustratar and etcher, whose work hangs in the White House and in many public buildings and art museums throughout the country, died yesterday at his home, 160 East Seventy-second Street, after a short illness. He was 65 years old.

headline.main: F. LUIS MORA, 65, A NOTED PAINTER; Portrait of Harding Hung in White House--Artist Dies in His Home Here KNOWN FOR HIS MURALS Pictures Appear in Museums of U.S. and Canada--He Received Many Honors

docs.snippet: MONTEVIDEO, Uruguay, June 5 --The framework of the Nazi organization in Uruguay indicates that the German leaders are working carefully and efficiently on an international play that looks toward the eventual invasion and occupation of this country...
docs.lead_paragraph: MONTEVIDEO, Uruguay, June 5 --The framework of the Nazi organization in Uruguay indicates that the German leaders are working carefully and efficiently on an international play that looks toward the eventual invasion and occupation of this country with the help of Nazi groups in Argentina and Brazil.
docs.abstract: Nazi seizure plan indicated; party groups operate at key points

headline.main: Nazi Plan to Seize Uruguay Indicated; Party Cells Are Operating of Key Points; NAZI PLOT TO TAKE URUGUAY OUTLINED

headline.main: The International Situation; On the Battle Fronts

docs.snippet: Reports from France that French traps are playing havoc with theGerman mechanized army brought a cautious advance yesterday in the stock market, but trading continued in its dull state.
docs.lead_paragraph: Reports from France that French traps are playing havoc with theGerman mechanized army brought a cautious advance yesterday in the stock market, but trading continued in its dull state.
